snippet.title: Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde Gameplay
snippet.description: This game is bad as everyone said.  What if you can get past that part where the reviewers on the web that couldn't show the rest of the game?  In this video it goes through the first 3 levels as Dr. Jekyll, and the first 2 levels as Mr. Hyde.  The gameplay is boring and pointless as Dr. Jekyll.  Playing as Mr. Hyde is my favorite part of the game.  You can shoot the Psycho-Wave at enemies by pressing B and Up.  This doesn't stop this game from sucking.
